name: Game Jame Simulator 2019
description:
Simulating the experience of creating a game in a game jam. On the first day, brainstorm ideas and fit the ideas together without letting your scope get too large. On the second day, type as fast as you possibly can to get your game finished before the end!!!

The game isn't finished and doesn't work.

Credits:

Programming (Stage 1) - Jade Marmorstein

Programming (Stage 2) - Jonah Venglarcik

Art - Amanda Ting

Music by SketchLogic from OpenGameArt
